definitions: the action of dividing a large task or process into several stages

examples.text: the phasing of the overall project

shortDefinitions: action of dividing large task or process into phases

definitions: the relationship between the timing of two or more events, or the adjustment of this relationship

examples.text: graphical techniques were used to investigate the phasing of traffic lights

shortDefinitions: relationship between timing of two or more events

definitions: the modification of the sound signal from an electric guitar or other electronic instrument by introducing a phase shift into either of two copies of it and then recombining them.
shortDefinitions: modification of sound signal from electric guitar
